descmd: This STU Update of The Da Vinci Clinical Data Exchange (CDex) Implementation Guide is the fourth published version of this guide. The sponsoring [HL7 International Payer/Provider Information Exchange Work Group](http://www.hl7.org/Special/committees/claims) members agreed to and voted on the resolution of the community review comments and edits to this guide. For a detailed list of the changes for this version, see the [Change Notes](http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/STU7/changes.html).
desc: This STU Update of The Da Vinci Clinical Data Exchange (CDex) Implementation Guide is the fourth published version of this guide. The sponsoring HL7 International Payer/Provider Information Exchange Work Group members agreed to and voted on the resolution of the community review comments and edits to this guide. For a detailed list of the changes for this version, see the Change Notes at http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/STU7/changes.html.
